value:
The smiles of the Askran people are a
treasure unto themselves and a
shining beacon for future generations.

I desire nothing more than a life of
peace for Ylisse's people, Chrom and
Lissa included.

Military force is vital, but that
alone is not enough...$k$pEmpathy and tolerance must be the
foundations of any path to tranquility.

I may not be so bold as to face Askr's
foes head-on in battle, but I hope my
restorative abilities can be of use.

Citizens do not live only to serve their
country.$k$pOn the contrary, a country and its
royalty, myself included, exist at their
behest and for their benefit.

I am Emmeryn. Your friend
$Nf wishes that
you find what you seek.
May the world overflow with altruism.

Let us praise the goddess's hand in
guiding us toward a path of steady
growth.
Forgive my unbecoming performance...

Thank you kindly. Your graciousness
inspires me.

I am Emmeryn. The Halidom of
Ylisse is under my watchful eye. May
our alliance be strong and fruitful...

Your dedication to Askr and empathy
for its people is truly empowering.$k$pAs a summoner, you are blessed with
immense power, but that quality
alone is not what defines you.$k$pI regard you as a leader driven by
such an innate tenderness for others
that your kindness is contagious.$k$pFrom that behavior, good is born.
It fosters resolve and determination
among the people. A benefit to all.$k$pCherish that benevolence, for it shall
illuminate the path you are meant to
trek, $Nu.
はいっ
これで…
ああっ…
いけない…！
For a peaceful world...
I believe in my people.
I will defend Ylisse!
You must be stopped!
Chrom...Lissa...
ふふ…
Are you alright?
May the gods protect you...
I am Emmeryn, Exalt of the Halidom of Ylisse. I hope I can be of some use to you.
I know that Chrom and Lissa must step into danger now and then. As their older sister, however, I feel entitled to worry.
I am feeling quite well. Did you suspect otherwise?
Even a small act of compassion can have a tremendous impact upon the world.
The Heroes are all drawn to your kindness. I should know... I am one of them.
For peace.
Shall we?
Let us proceed.
